means: 满是浮渣的，浮渣般的，下流的

sentence.Network_en: I don't like walking through the scummy part of town.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不喜欢走过城里的下层居民区.

sentence.Network_en: A scummy sterility hanging over the town, a fog of book - learning.
sentence.Network_cn: 这座城镇笼罩在一种卑下的贫乏和啃书本的浓雾中,学的全是以往的渣滓.
